problem_names:
lemma injective_on:
      assumes "x \<in> A" "y \<in> A" "f x = f y"
      shows "x = y"

lemma inj_on_bijection:
    assumes "inj_on f A"
    shows "bijection A (f ` A) f (inv_into A f)"
translations: lemma inj_on[intro]: "inj_on f A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on f A
using inj_onI left_inverse

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<And>x y.
      \<lbrakk>x \<in> ?A; y \<in> ?A; ?f x = ?f y\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> x = y) \<Longrightarrow>
  inj_on ?f ?A
  ?x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> g (f ?x) = ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inj_on f A
by metis

lemma injective_on:
      assumes "x \<in> A" "y \<in> A" "f x = f y"
      shows "x = y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = y
using assms left_inverse

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> A
  y \<in> A
  f x = f y
  ?x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> g (f ?x) = ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x = y
by metis
end

locale injective = bounded_function +
    assumes injection: "\<exists> g. injection A B f g"
  begin
definition "g \<equiv> SOME g. injection A B f g"
sublocale injection A B f g

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. injection A B f g
unfolding g_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. injection A B f (SOME g. injection A B f g)
using someI_ex[OF injection]

proof (prove)
using this:
  injection A B f (SOME x. injection A B f x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. injection A B f (SOME g. injection A B f g)
by this
end

locale surjection = bounded_function_pair +
    assumes right_inverse[simp]: "y \<in> B \<Longrightarrow> f (g y) = y"
  begin
lemma image_superset[intro]: "f ` A \<supseteq> B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. B \<subseteq> f ` A
using g.wellformed image_iff right_inverse subsetI

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x \<in> B \<Longrightarrow> g ?x \<in> A
  (?z \<in> ?f ` ?A) = (\<exists>x\<in>?A. ?z = ?f x)
  ?y \<in> B \<Longrightarrow> f (g ?y) = ?y
  (\<And>x. x \<in> ?A \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> ?B) \<Longrightarrow>
  ?A \<subseteq> ?B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. B \<subseteq> f ` A
by metis
lemma image_eq[simp]: "f ` A = B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f ` A = B
using image_superset

proof (prove)
using this:
  B \<subseteq> f ` A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f ` A = B
by auto
end

locale surjective = bounded_function +
    assumes surjection: "\<exists> g. surjection A B f g"
  begin
definition "g \<equiv> SOME g. surjection A B f g"
sublocale surjection A B f g

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. surjection A B f g
unfolding g_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. surjection A B f (SOME g. surjection A B f g)
using someI_ex[OF surjection]

proof (prove)
using this:
  surjection A B f (SOME x. surjection A B f x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. surjection A B f (SOME g. surjection A B f g)
by this
end
locale bijection = injection + surjection

lemma inj_on_bijection:
    assumes "inj_on f A"
    shows "bijection A (f ` A) f (inv_into A f)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Functions.bijection A (f ` A) f (inv_into A f)
proof

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> f ` A
 2. \<And>x. x \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f x \<in> A
 3. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f (f x) = x
 4. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f y) = y
show "\<And> x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> f ` A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> f ` A
using imageI

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x \<in> ?A \<Longrightarrow> ?f ?x \<in> ?f ` ?A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> f ` A
by this

proof (state)
this:
  ?x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f ?x \<in> f ` A

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f x \<in> A
 2. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f (f x) = x
 3. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f y) = y
show "\<And> y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f y \<in> A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f y \<in> A
using inv_into_into

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x \<in> ?f ` ?A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into ?A ?f ?x \<in> ?A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f y \<in> A
by this

proof (state)
this:
  ?y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f ?y \<in> A

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f (f x) = x
 2. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f y) = y
show "\<And> x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f (f x) = x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f (f x) = x
using inv_into_f_f assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>inj_on ?f ?A; ?x \<in> ?A\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> inv_into ?A ?f (?f ?x) = ?x
  inj_on f A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f (f x) = x
by this

proof (state)
this:
  ?x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> inv_into A f (f ?x) = ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f y) = y
show "\<And> y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f y) = y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f y) = y
using f_inv_into_f

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?y \<in> ?f ` ?A \<Longrightarrow> ?f (inv_into ?A ?f ?y) = ?y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y. y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f y) = y
by this

proof (state)
this:
  ?y \<in> f ` A \<Longrightarrow> f (inv_into A f ?y) = ?y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
